data.name: Trainz 2019 DLC - Pro Train: Class 68 Chiltern Railways
data.detailed_description:
The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh Spain) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom. The design is derived from the Stadler Eurolight, and Stadler's product name for this variant is the UKLight. Since its introduction in 2014, the Class 68 has been used on DRS's freight operations, in addition has been used to haul various charter trains. Several units have been subleased to other operators, including Chiltern Railways, Abellio ScotRail, and TransPennine Express, for passenger services, hauling various rakes of carriages.

made by 3DZUG for the Pro Train series, in the Chiltern Railways livery.

- BR Class 68 Chiltern Railways
- Nameplates (Oxford Flyer)
- Running Numbers
- Realistic model and textures
- Realistic drivers cabin
- Functional sun blind
- AWS Support
- Wipers
- Cabin displays
data.about_the_game:
The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh Spain) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom. The design is derived from the Stadler Eurolight, and Stadler's product name for this variant is the UKLight. Since its introduction in 2014, the Class 68 has been used on DRS's freight operations, in addition has been used to haul various charter trains. Several units have been subleased to other operators, including Chiltern Railways, Abellio ScotRail, and TransPennine Express, for passenger services, hauling various rakes of carriages.

made by 3DZUG for the Pro Train series, in the Chiltern Railways livery.

data.short_description: Jump aboard the highly detailed DRS Class 68 locomotive in the Chiltern Railways livery from 3DZug!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
